test.name: As a user I should have a quick access to view the status of Home

kw.name: Given : user launches and logs in to the Lumina application
When : user navigates to "Water Card" screen from the "Add New Device Dashboard" screen
Then : user should see a quick view the following:
kw.msg: [PASS] Succesfully navigated to DEVICE STATUSand installed is : Alerts
[PASS] Current Humidity of WLD device : 57.5% Humidity Tab 2 of 2
